sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router'; const SignIn = () => { const [register, setRegister] = useState({username:"", email: "", password: ""}) const handlerSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const navigate= useNavigate axios.post("/api/sign", register) .then(()=>{}) } return (
setRegister({...register, username: e.target.value})} value={register.username}/>
setRegister({...register, email: e.target.value})} value={register.email}/>
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
setRegister({...register, password: e.target.value})} value={register.password}/>
) } export default SignIn
